item.name: Register a new user and return their API token.

header.value: HMAC signature of the request payload done via sha256.

request.description:
This endpoint is used to register a new user, including their name, email, password,
and password confirmation.

header.value: HMAC signature of the request payload done via sha256.

request.description: Authenticates a user with email and password. Returns an API token with expiry timer.
Logs out the currently authenticated user by invalidating their API token.

query.description: The hash to verify the email.

request.description: Once a user registers, a notification is sent out to their specified email address, which requires them to verify.
Once a user registers, a notification is sent out to their specified email address, which requires them to verify. Incase they dont recieve one, they can request again.

header.value: HMAC signature of the request payload done via sha256.

request.description: Sends a password reset email to the specified email address.

header.value: HMAC signature of the request payload done via sha256.

request.description: Resets the user's password using the provided reset token.

variable.description: The payment gateway to use. Currently supported: `stripe`.

request.description:
Creates or retrieves a Stripe PaymentIntent for a given order. If a payment already exists,
it will return the existing client secret to avoid duplicate charges.

response.name: Already Paid
Order Not Found

request.description:
This endpoint is triggered by Stripe when a payment event occurs (e.g., payment succeeded, failed).
It verifies the webhook signature and processes the payment status accordingly.
